guides.title: Callouts
guides.description: by FLC and Hitzel. Images of every map with proposed name for every important location for more precise callouts in voice chat. Also includes some general tips on how to callout.

guides.title: Coaching
guides.description: by Dr. Prodigy and FLC. Guide that explains what a coach should be doing in the context of this game.

guides.title: Roles
guides.description: by FLC. Outline of how the author thinks about the game regarding team compositions and player roles.

guides.title: Tournament Organizing
guides.description: by Ink.Jordan. How to run an event of your own.

guides.title: Chara's Guides
guides.description: guides on Brella and Explosher both in video and written formats.

guides.title: A Foil Squeezer guide
guides.description: by Riki. How to play the weapon more people in west should be playing.

guides.title: Glossary of Splatoon 2 Terms
guides.description: by @RobynHooked & @starbiit. Deciphers some terminology related to competitive Splatoon.

youtube.title: Advanced Techniques, Tips and Tricks
youtube.description: by Wadsm. Different tricks to keep in mind.

youtube.title: The Ultimate Gear Guide
youtube.description: by Wadsm. Everything you need to know about gear and abilities.

youtube.title: How to become good
youtube.description: by Wadsm. General tips on how to improve in Splatoon 2.

youtube.title: How to Get Out of A/B/C/S Rank Series
youtube.description: by Bravous Esports. Tips on how to improve and advance through solo ranks.

youtube.title: How to improve your aim
youtube.description: by flc. Splatoon is quite unique game when learning how to aim. This video teaches you the ropes.

youtube.title: flc's Twitch highlights
youtube.description: flc has a lot of useful videos highlighted on Twitch such as match analyses and tutorials.

youtube.title: Rainmaker paths
youtube.description: by Kiver. Video that goes over every map explaining where the Rainmaker should go.

youtube.title: Splatoon Documentary
youtube.description: by Akshon Esports. Good place to start if you want to learn some history of the scene.

misc.title: Frame Data
misc.description: by Shad√≥ Chimera. Frame data for every weapon.

misc.title: Salmon Run Records
misc.description: all Salmon Run records in one place.

misc.title: Splatoon News (Twitter)
misc.description: upcoming events and other news regarding competitive Splatoon in one Twitter account.

misc.title: Tier List Maker
misc.description: make a tier list of your own like all the cool kids on Twitter.

misc.title: Tournament Weapon Data
misc.description: by ganbawoomy. Focus on Japanese tournaments. Lets you browse past tournaments and get information about what weapons were played by the top placing teams.

misc.title: Weapon Ranges
misc.description: by Oculus049. Spreadsheet with weapons listed by range.

misc.title: splatoon2.ink
misc.description: information about map and SplatNet gear rotations.

misc.title: stat.ink
misc.description: upload your battle history to save it beyond the 50 limit imposed by Nintendo's app.

misc.title: Inkipedia
misc.description: Splatoon wiki. Useful for looking up random information about the game.

misc.title: Splatoon Content Creators
misc.description: gathered by Avrel. You can use this spreadsheet to find content creators that play your weapon or speak your language.

misc.title: Japanese player listing
misc.description: find Japanese top players to follow on Openrec (Japanese streaming website), YouTube and Twitter. Weapons are included so it's easy to find people that play your weapons.

misc.title: splat_zone jp (YouTube)
misc.description: YouTube channel where you can watch top tier Japanese competitive gameplay.

misc.title: Ikaclo
misc.description: Japanese gear sharing website. Cool feature is seeing what gear has been released with what abilities.

misc.title: flc's blog
misc.description: writings about various things related to Splatoon.

misc.title: Splatoon speedruns
misc.description: Find videos of people playing Splatoon really fast.

discord.title: sendou.ink
discord.description: the server of this website. Aside from discussing anything related to this website occasionally tournaments are held.

discord.title: The Inkademy
discord.description: the biggest competitive Splatoon server with a bit of everything ranging from discussion about the game to LFG channels.

discord.title: Salmon Run Server
discord.description: if Salmon Run is your thing this server is probably the place to be.

discord.title: Salmon Run Overfishing
discord.description: more competitive Salmon Run server with a lot of resources.

discord.title: CHECKPOINT 1
discord.description: LFG server meant for casual and low level players.

discord.title: Inkopolis Crosswalk
discord.description: more comprehensive list of Discord servers than this one.

discord.title: LUTI
discord.description: the biggest western Splatoon event. Being a league divided into multiple divisions based on experience makes it a natural place for new teams to get started.
